title: Calculator
description: A simple web-based calculator with basic operations, keyboard support, and responsive design.

title: Car Filter App
description: A web app to filter cars by type, brand, model, and other criteria using JavaScript.

title: Qintronics Electronics Store (Frontend)
description: An e-commerce app for electronics, featuring product filtering, cart management, and pagination.

title: Star Wars Archive
description: A Star Wars-themed app displaying characters and starships using data from the SWAPI.

title: Trip Planner App
description: A React app for planning trips with dynamic country data and trip management features.

title: Car Dealership App
description: An Angular app for managing a car dealership with advanced filters and PostgreSQL integration.

title: Swaggify Music App
description: A NestJS music app with a robust backend, API documentation via Swagger, and PostgreSQL database.

title: Company Management App
description: A NestJS app for managing company data with API documentation and PostgreSQL database.

title: Animal Shelter App
description: A Node.js app for managing animal adoptions, using MongoDB for data storage.

title: Post Management App
description: A Node.js app for creating, liking, updating, and deleting posts, with full authentication.

title: Qintronics Electronics Store (Full-Stack)
description: A full-stack e-commerce application for electronics shopping with a robust backend. Features include authentication and authorization, dynamic product filtering, seamless cart management, and the ability to create categories, sections, and products.
